Name: Trials of Fire
About the game: Trials of Fire is a tactical, deck-building adventure game set in a fantasy world in ruin. Savage combat and tough decisions await in the unforgiving wastelands of Ashe. Trials of Fire combines overworld exploration, multi-character combat and loot linked deck-building to create fresh strategic options on every run. Content added during Early Access 9 Playable Heroes 4 Game Modes + 1 Seasonal Quest 4 Lore Quests 345 Skill Cards 220 Items 42 Legendary Items 294 Narrative Encounters 56 Enemy Types 14 Bosses 40 Landmarks Issue combat commands to each Hero based on their cards. The combination of 3 Hero decks presents new and interesting challenges in every fight. Movement and positional play are critical to survival in combat. Use powerful card synergies to combine the unique abilities of your three heroes. Outside of combat encounters, the party's loadout of weapons, items and gear can be swapped or upgraded. New items and weapons are discovered while exploring the vast overworld of Ashe. Traverse an immense overworld map and author a unique adventure in a dangerous hunt for resources critical to the survival of Terralin. Every journey you take will be a Trial.
